definitions.example: This latest discovery should eventually lead to much better treatments for disease.
Automatic discovery of RSS feeds by a Web browser.

definitions.definition: An act of uncovering or revealing something; a revelation.
A pre-trial phase in which evidence is gathered.
definitions.example: The prosecution moved to suppress certain items turned up during discovery.

definitions.definition: Materials revealed to the opposing party during the pre-trial phase in which evidence is gathered.
definitions.example: The defense argued that the plaintiff's discovery was inadequate.
